Title: Authentic FREY WILLE Hundertwasser Emotional Spiral Enamel Diva Bangle LARGE NIB
Description: I am downsizing and selling all my personally collections! I have personally acquired this from Europe.Guaranteed 100% authentic FREY WILLE in the most beautiful enamel with 24K accents bangle from their famous "Hommage à Hundertwasser" collection in the "Emotional Spiral" design. This bangle is set in white gold decor in multi-colored enamel (red, yellow, blue, white, green, black and platinum color gold etc.) in abstract pattern on a rhodium plated white goldtone mounting.This is a wide DIVA bangle avant garde style with 2 white gold-plated mounting rims.You have to see it in person to see the magical beauty of it. I just cannot capture the lovely design and beautiful workmanship on a camera! The bangle width measures 1.5 inches (3.8 cm) wide. This is a Large (L): 2-5/8 inches (6.7 cm) wide interior diameter.The outside circumference is 9 inches (23 cm). The inside is 8.5 inches (21.5 cm). Please see the last gallery picture on how to measure your hand to determine if this bangle size is for you.Markings on the inside "© FREY WILLE and its logo " and "Made in Austria" .It will include the FREY WILLE original presentation box as shown. I have a post card from Frey Wille with this bangle featured in the post card as shown. I can make copy for you if you want but it DOES NOT include in this listing. I keep it for reference!Condition is brand new in box as shown and no defect at all. There may be lighting reflection only. This is one of my favorite designs! I do not accept return on this item due to delicate jewelry item. If you are buying this as gift and may need to return it, please notify me first before purchasing this item. Even if you buy from a Frey Wille store, they will not accept return nor exchange. I describe my item exactly what it is. I personally took the pictures and measurements myself.
